revision.comment: Netgear appears to have spun Arlo IoT devices off under Arlo Technologies
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Arlo Light |revision=(AL1101) |asin=B07BZMM3WJ |price=130 |est_release_date=05/25/2018 |fcc_date=04/15/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless light, IoT |fcc_id=PY317300395, 2APLE17300395 |ic_id=4054A-17300395 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=CSR1025 |fla1=256 KiB |ram1=80 KiB |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.2 LE Chip;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR1025;CSR, 1025, A05U, 645C25;1; ,,, Low-Power BTLE Front-End;Skyworks;SKY66111-11;SKY66111-11, 824107.1, 1763 MX;1; |flags=IP65, Bluetooth 4.2 LE, motion sensor, |802dot11_protocols=no Wi-Fi capability }} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arlo.com/en-us/landing/arlo-security-light/}}
Sold as an individual add-on light or in kits including a hub and one, two, or three lights: * ALS1101 ($150) - 1x [[Netgear Arlo Bridge (ABB1000)]] + 1x [[Netgear Arlo Light (AL1101)]] - [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07BZMZMRL Amazon] * ALS1102 ($250) - 1x [[Netgear Arlo Bridge (ABB1000)]] + 2x [[Netgear Arlo Light (AL1101)]] - [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B078L1FZXS Amazon] * ALS1103 ($350) - 1x [[Netgear Arlo Bridge (ABB1000)]] + 3x [[Netgear Arlo Light (AL1101)]] - [https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07BZLYS3X Amazon]
The battery is labeled as model number "A-1B" 7.2V, 17.57Wh, 2440mAh, Li-ion
===See also=== *[[Netgear Arlo Bridge (ABB1000)]]
